summary:
After my classical pianostudy I decided in 1995 to specialise in the Argentina tangomusic. On the conservatorium of Rotterdam I had the opportunity to study tango interpretation ( piano ) with Carel Kraayenhof and  Gustavo Beytelmann.   Tango Dorado,(Christiaan van Hemert artistic leader) went   touring through the Netherlands and abroad. 
Tango Dorado produced  double CD's, DVD, tours with Sandra Rumolino, José Rivero,  Jenny Arean, Petra Berger.
  Trio Tangata , my tango-ensemble   : bandonéon, double bass and piano, gives concerts in Holland and abroad .

In 2008 I received the Choclo award for my  tango compositions . In 2010 we went to Argentina and could meet maestro Horracio Ferrer.

I played with several orquestras , and toured with the 4 seasons ensemble stringensemble with Christiaan v Hemert.
In 2011 I made with Trio Tangata and singers: José Rivero (Argentina)and Lilian Vieira(Brasil) our second CD "Historias del Sur".

may 2014 , I was invited by the Tango society of Minnesota  to play  in Minneapolis. solo concerts and on milongas. with musicians from Minneapolis.

2015  a new CD with Trio Tangata and singer Jeannine Geerts: " Encuentros" 
2016 :tours  in Holland and abroad   to Granada,  Germany,  Lissabon.   I was invited to play on the Horto music festival Greece with Emmy Storms (violin) and the Hague chamber orchest. 
We played my compositions and  Piazzolla .
with Tangata we  played  at the Schleswig Holstein Musik Festival. 
in 2016 new concerts together with singer actrice Kees Scholten and  spcial guest Emmy Storms  "de moed om te vertrekken " 
2017 : at march the 1d my new cd "Moving Friends " will be ready.  this cd has 12 compositions from me,  and besides aswell from Bach,  Piazzolla. , Troilo .
2018: Tangata made the 4th cd : live recorded at  the concerthall TivoliVredenburg  Utrecht.  together with my collegues  Andrea Bentivoglio violin,  Jacqueline Edeling bandoneon,  Boris Franz double bass. Jeannine Geerts vocals.

treasury_media.title: Tales of A Blue Heart_thumbnail_1200x1200px.png
treasury_media.description: Afgelopen maand is deze nieuwe cd "  Tales of a blue heart " uitgekomen. in eigen beheer. van Ad Colen en mij . inmiddels fragment al  gedraaid  op de concertzender en op 3FM ( Wijnand ) . op 18 juni kunt u ons live horen: de cd  presentatie . Domplein Utrecht , ism Ujazz. welkom! www.margreetmarkerink.com www.adcolen.com

treasury_media.title: Summer 2019 : concerts in IZ
treasury_media.description: Summer 2019 We played 5 concerts in Croatia : the isle of IZ and Rava , with string-ensemble & Emmy Storms violin. This summer our programm had , besides beautiful classical music , and Piazzolla, 5 compositions of myself , in arrangement for strings. Happy about that

special project: Tangata & Aubrey Snell(saxofoon )  sept/okt 2018.
treasury_media.description: this new project is a new sound of Tangata : with Aubrey Snell.  7 okt Sparrendaal Driebergen.

treasury_media.title: new cd Alive! was on radio Chile sept 2018
treasury_media.description: Tangata has a wonderful new cd called Alive! live recorded in TivoliVredenburg.  and was soon after its release on Radio Chile. by Hernan Stevenson.

treasury_media.title: kees Scholten actor  Emmy Storms violin and Margreet Markerink with music Theatre
treasury_media.description: Kees Emmy and me have a musical show about the story of Argentina tango music /dance ..in may 2018 winner of the  jury prize Utrecht Kleinkunst Festival

treasury_media.title: with Singer Jeannine Geerts
treasury_media.description:
Tangata plays with the great singer Jeannine Geerts. .and sometimes as a duo.
Argentina tangomusic /chansons from France.  some popballads or crossovers.

publications.name: cd  Moving Friends" with my own compostions. https://open.spotify.com/album/7EG0dKkJKBxBCwKvjRepEH?si=pwmQeVcNSc23yqh0-45CoQ

Aqui (instrumental music for septet), Te Quiero (vocal music), Cancion y milonga (instrumental music for Trio), Tamba , Tibor Tango , Candombe nocturno , Minnesota Tango, luces de Belmonte.  Pienso en ti, Winter Move and many other compositions
publications.publisher: .2 double cd s and DVD with Tango Dorado. 3 cd's with Trio Tangata. new solo/duo cd februari 2017

profile_positions.company: .Concerts at theaters, festivals, concerthalls, in Holland and abroad.
profile_positions.description:
A trio, consisting of bandonéon,piano and double bass. Trio Tangata has an extensive repertoire, ranging from old tango to Piazzolla aswell as original arangements and award winning compositions. Trio Tangata consists of Jacqueline Edeling bandonéon, Adinda Meertins/Suze Stiphout double bass and Margreet Markerink piano, who are musicians from the well known septet Tango Dorado aswell. José Rivero, one of the best and famous tangosingers from nowadays, is a current guest from Trio Tangata and Tango Dorado.
Since 2015 the Argentina musician Andrea Bentivoglio (strings) joins Trio Tangata. So the trio is now a quartet with a beautiful and string sound. 
Tangata as quarteto can be seen in many concerts and festivals . See www.triotangata.nl for the further info..
profile_positions.title: pianiste , specialism: Argentina tangomusic at Trio Tangata; Tango Dorado; 4 seasons ensemble
